footer.address: No. 28, Daye S. Rd., Xiaogang Dist., Kaohsiung City 812, Taiwan (R.O.C.)

index.intro:
Yuan Long Stainless Steel Corporation, established in 2005, is a subsidiary of the Far Eastern Group. As a cold-rolled stainless steel supplier with an annual production capacity of 130,000 tons, our products are sold to over 40 countries worldwide.
With Taiwan as its base, Yuan Long demonstrates impressive strength in the global metal processing industry market.
Yuan Long fully implements a quality management system, embodying the spirit of continuous improvement, constantly enhancing quality and productivity. Our products have earned the trust and recognition of customers.
Yuan Long aims to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050. Through various energy management measures, we take practical actions to conserve energy and reduce carbon emissions, contributing to the sustainability of our planet.

feature5.title: Yuan Long Cares About Green Mission
feature5.content_1: Yuan Long is committed to building a green constitution from the inside out
feature5.content_2: Adopting ISO 50001 energy management system and EU-certified renewable energy
feature5.content_3: Prioritizing the procurement of green eco-labeled raw materials and using recycled materials for packaging
feature5.content_4: Aiming to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050, realizing the vision of sustainable corporate development

feature6.title: ISO 9001, JIS mark and IATF 16949 Quality Policy
feature6.content_1: We fully implement the relevant operational standards of ISO 9001, JIS Q1001, and IATF 16949 to structure our quality management system, enhancing our professional capabilities in stainless steel and service quality. We embody the spirit of continuous improvement to enhance quality and productivity, achieving customer satisfaction. We commit to establishing quality objectives based on our quality policy and, while meeting customer and legal requirements, implementing various improvement measures to continuously enhance our quality management system.

tech.title: Professional Technology
tech.phase1: Yuan Long possesses core equipment for the cold rolling process of stainless steel, as well as professional capabilities in rewinding, slitting, cutting, and inspection. We also have slitting machines to meet customer orders for different widths.

zm1.title: 20-High Cold Rolling Mill
zm1.phase2: Rolls hot-rolled steel coils to a thickness of 0.25~1.5mm, improving flatness and brightness.

ba.title: Bright Annealing Line
ba.phase2: Anneals hardened steel coils post-rolling, growing and softening the grain for workability.

spl.title: Skin Pass Mill
spl.phase2: Carries out tempering to enhance the product's brightness and workability.

tll.title: Tension Levelling Line
tll.phase2: Levels the surface of steel sheets, achieving better flatness and mechanical properties.

sl.title: Slitting Line
sl.phase2: Slits coils into narrower strips according to customer order requirements.

companyIntro.title: About YLSS
companyIntro.phase1:
Yuan Long Stainless Steel Corp. was established in 2005, located in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. As a subsidiary of the Far Eastern Group, we are a cold-rolled stainless steel supplier with an annual production capacity of 130,000 tons, selling products to over 40 countries worldwide.
Yuan Long Stainless Steel fully implements a quality management system, embodying the spirit of continuous improvement to enhance quality and productivity. Our products have gained customer trust and recognition.
Yuan Long Stainless Steel aims to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050. Through various energy management measures, we take practical actions to conserve energy and reduce carbon emissions, gradually transforming into a low-carbon green enterprise and contributing to global sustainability.

coreValue.title: Core Values
coreValue.phase1:
We always adhere to our group values of "Integrity, Diligence, Simplicity, Prudence, Innovation," striving tirelessly for corporate sustainability, embodying our core values of "People-Centered, Trust, Pragmatism, Innovation."
1. People-Centered – Focus on employee needs and development, fulfilling corporate social responsibility.
2. Trust – Become a trusted partner for clients, ensuring mutual success.
3. Pragmatism – Stay grounded, persevere, and focus on doing every task well.
4. Innovation – Embrace cross-disciplinary learning, breakthrough challenges, continuously improve, and enhance quality.

view.title: Mission and Vision
view.phase1:
Mission: "Manufacture high-quality, low-carbon cold-rolled stainless steel."
Vision: "To become the industry's best option, a green low-carbon cold-rolled stainless steel supplier."

contact.title: Yuan Long Stainless Steel Corp.
contact.phase1: Business Types: OEM Manufacturer/Exporter, Agency & Wholesale, Value-Added Distributor
contact.phase2: Main Products: 300 and 400 series stainless steel
contact.phase3: ISO and/or other safety/quality certifications: ISO 9001, ISO 50001, ISO 45001, ISO 14001, ISO 14064, ISO 14067, CNS 45001, ISO/IEC 17025, IATF 16949, JQA JIS G4305, BIS IS 6911

cert.title: ISO 9001, JIS mark, and IATF 16949 Quality Policy
cert.phase1: Adhering to our quality policy, we fully implement the ISO 9001 Quality Management System, JIS Q1001 Conformity Assessment - Certification to Japanese Industrial Standards - General Requirements for Certification Bodies, and IATF 16949 Automotive Quality Management System standards to structure our quality management system. We aim to enhance our stainless steel expertise and service quality, and uphold the spirit of continuous improvement to enhance quality and productivity, achieving customer satisfaction. We commit to establishing quality objectives based on our quality policy and implementing various improvement measures to continuously enhance our quality management system while meeting customer and legal requirements.

policy.title: ISO 9001 Quality Management System/IATF 16949 International Standard for Automotive Quality Management Systems

lab.title: Laboratory Quality Policy
lab.phase1: Following the guideline of our quality policy, we fully implement ISO 9001 and ISO/IEC 17025 quality management systems. We aim to enhance our stainless steel expertise and service quality, and uphold the spirit of continuous improvement to enhance quality and productivity, achieving customer satisfaction. We commit to establishing quality objectives based on our quality policy and implementing various improvement measures to continuously enhance our quality management system while meeting customer and legal requirements.
lab.phase2: ISO/IEC 17025 YLSS Laboratory (No. 3537) Quality Policy: Providing efficient and reliable testing services under the principles of fairness, independence, and transparency.

lists.title: International Quality Standards Certification
lists.phase1: YLSS demonstrates a commitment to quality by achieving international certifications such as ISO, JIS, BIS, IATF, TAF, and CNS.
lists.iso45001: ISO 45001 2018 version (20220729-20250708) Occupational Health and Safety Management System
lists.cns45001_1: TOSHMS CNS 45001: 2018 (1110729-1140707) Taiwan Occupational Health Management System
lists.cns45001_2: TOSHMS CNS 45001: 2018 (1110729-1140707) Taiwan Occupational Health Management System
lists.iso14064: ISO 14064-1 2018 version (20220810) Greenhouse Gas Verification Statement
lists.iso14067: ISO 14067 2018 version (20230306-20250305) Carbon Footprint Verification Statement
lists.iatf16949: IATF 16949 2016 version (20240426-20270425) Automotive Quality Management System Certification

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.content: We uphold core values of Collaboration, Integrity, Professionalism, Accountability, and are committed to providing excellent service in every aspect.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.content: Every member is part of the team. We encourage mutual support and communication to face challenges together.

inclusiveEnvironment.title: Cultural diversity in the workplace
inclusiveEnvironment.content: We value diversity and strive to create an inclusive workplace. We welcome talents from different backgrounds and perspectives.

personalGrowth.title: Career development
personalGrowth.content: We believe outstanding talents are the company's most valuable asset. We provide diverse training courses and clear promotion paths to help every member grow in their career.

workLifeBalance.title: Work & Life Balance
workLifeBalance.content: Flexible working hours to support balance between work and personal life.

joinUs.title: Join Us
joinUs.content: If you want to be part of this vibrant and diverse team, apply now! Please submit your resume proactively.

salary.title: Salary and Bonus System
salary.content1: Guaranteed annual salary of around 14.5 months (based on full pay): Mid-Autumn Festival bonus (half salary), Dragon Boat Festival bonus (half salary), year-end bonus plus attendance bonus (about 1.5 months).
salary.content2: Non-fixed bonuses: Production and sales bonus, production and sales retention bonus.
salary.content3: Assessment bonuses: Annual assessments with a comprehensive promotion system.

welfare.title: Employee Welfare Committee
welfare.content1: Voucher distribution: Festival vouchers (Chinese New Year, Labor Day, Dragon Boat Festival, Mid-Autumn Festival), birthday vouchers, annual surplus voucher distribution.
welfare.content2: Subsidies: Wedding and funeral subsidies, children's education subsidies, travel subsidies, emergency subsidies.

companyBenefits.title: Company Benefits:
companyBenefits.content: Labor and health insurance, occupational injury insurance, group insurance, labor pension contributions, employee health check-ups, employee uniforms, on-site parking for employees, family day trips, employee travel, book clubs, club activities, Christmas events (including migrant worker gatherings), year-end party, retirement farewell parties for employees.

training.title: Training and Development
training.content: New employee training, Skills training, General education, On-the-job training (OJT).

contact.heading: Dear Customers, Should you have any inquiries or interests, please fill out the form below or call our service hotline at +886-7-757-988. We will do our best to assist you!
contact.title: Contact and Inquiry
contact.name: Name
contact.success: Your message has been successfully sent. We will contact you as soon as possible. Thank you!
contact.askingPriceEmpty: You can find the products you want to inquire about on the product introduction page and add them to the inquiry form to contact us.
